resources.string:
Hi, my name is Ibroximjon. 

I love playing chess. 

And I'm huge fan of mobile programming. 
Now I am a student of Inha University in Tashkent, and I am studying in software engineering faculty. 
Since 2022, I have been learning mobile development. In the beginning I decided to learn Flutter and Dart. 
Nowadays I am learning Android Kotlin from nanodegree program in Udacity.
